titles: A note of such things as were stollen in Lyons, on Munday night the eleventh of June 1630, in the house which is knowne by the signe of the  Sunnes-rising in the street de la Poullaillerie in the said citie of Lyons
author: De la Barre, Mr.
notes: Lists items taken, and gives name and address to which they may be reported if found.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Jewel thieves --  France --  Lyon --  Early works to 1800.
Robbery --  France --  Lyon --  Early works to 1800.
